alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 5:16PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM EST... At 516 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Cairo to 10 miles south of St. Marks. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Alma, Cody, Dills, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher, Goose Pasture, Festus, Aucilla, Capps, and Lois. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for Big Bend Florida.
